results.title: Post operative care
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Care of the sick and injured”.
Describes how to make an anaesthetic bed and how to put a patient in bed after an operation with minimal movement. Describes how a patient must be watched and every reaction noted while regaining consciousness.

results.title: Beautiful people [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Jasmin Disdar, Ben Woolford and Beautiful stories
results.brief_description: The ethnic conflict in the former Yugoslavia is an unlikely subject matter for this British black comedy which uses the Balkan war as a catalyst to explore a contemporary London bursting with racial discord. The films interconnected stories are set off by a brawl between a Serbian (Dado Jehan) and a Croatian (Faruk Pruti) on a busy downtown London bus, an apt and humorous metaphor for the worsening situation. Meanwhile a headmaster’s football hooligan son, inadvertently lands right in the middle of the war, a Tory MP’s daughter (Charlotte Coleman) falls in love with one of her patients and a BBC war correspondent suffering from ‘Bosnia syndrome’ tries to amputate his leg. Cast also includes Charles Kay, Julian Firth, Edward Jewsebury, Edin Dzandzanovic, Gilbert Martin. (Award: 1999 Winner-Un Certain Regard, Jasmin Disdar)

results.title: Beating the bracken
results.creator_credit: New South Wales. Dept. of Agriculture
results.brief_description: Recommends methods of removing bracken from the rich dairy country in the New South Wales coastal belt. Explains that broken bracken is the first stage in the removal of the pest. Illustrates the use of specially designed three-bladed rollers on hilly country. On level pastures the simple square log roller with steel flanges, the mower, the rotary hoe, or other mechanical equipment are suggested.

results.title: Beachworm! [the art of beachworming]
results.brief_description: Successful fishing is dependent on good bait and beach worms are one of the finest bait around. Professional wormer, Dan Fuller, meets presenter John Stewart on the Gold Coast and gives him the low down on day and night worming, covering aspects such as locating pippies for the berley, the mechanics of how to pull worms from the sand, place it on the hook, what sort of fish your likely to find on the end of the line, storage, legal limits and the dangers of night worming. Bloopers follow the final credits.
